content.description:
The following question is based on a recorded excerpt of vocal music; the text is provided below.
 line1And the angel said unto them,2Fear not; for, behold,3I bring you good tidings of great joy,4which shall be to all people.5For unto you is born this day6in the city of David a Saviour,7which is Christ the Lord.
content.question: The opening chord heard in the accompaniment can best be described as a

choices.label: minor tonic chord in root position
minor tonic chord in first inversion
major tonic chord in root position
major tonic chord in first inversion

content.answer: major tonic chord in first inversion

unit.text: 3: Music Fundamentals III - Triads and Seventh Chords

topic.text: 3.3: Chord Inversions and Figures - Introduction to Figured Bass

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
